faqs.question: What are the best sports betting apps?
faqs.answer: FanDuel, BetMGM, and Bet365 are the top sports betting apps based on App Store ratings, user reviews, and feature sets. FanDuel excels with its parlay builder, BetMGM offers MGM Rewards integration, and Bet365 provides extensive international markets.

faqs.question: Are sports betting apps legal in California?
faqs.answer: No, sports betting apps are not currently legal in California. Proposition 26 and 27 failed in November 2022. California residents cannot legally bet on sports through mobile apps.

faqs.question: What sports betting apps are 18+?
faqs.answer: In Montana, New Hampshire, Rhode Island, Wyoming, and Washington DC, you can use sports betting apps at 18+. All other states require 21+. Apps include FanDuel, DraftKings, BetMGM (where legal for 18+).

faqs.question: What sports betting apps are legal in Missouri?
faqs.keyword: what sports betting apps are legal in missouri
faqs.answer: Missouri legalized sports betting in November 2024. Available apps include FanDuel, DraftKings, BetMGM, Caesars, and others launching in 2025.

faqs.question: Are sports betting apps available in Colorado?
faqs.answer: Yes, sports betting apps are legal in Colorado since May 2020. Available apps include FanDuel, DraftKings, BetMGM, Bet365, Caesars, Fanatics, BetRivers, and more.

faqs.question: Are sports betting apps legal in Maine?
faqs.answer: Yes, sports betting apps are legal in Maine since November 2023. Available apps include DraftKings, Caesars, and Fanatics.

faqs.question: Are sports betting apps legal?
faqs.answer: Sports betting apps are legal in 38+ US states. Legality depends on your state. Apps are legal in states like New York, New Jersey, Pennsylvania, Colorado, and more. Always check your state's regulations.

faqs.question: Can 20 year olds use sports betting apps?
faqs.keyword: sports betting apps for 20 year olds
faqs.answer: No, 20 year olds cannot use sports betting apps in most states. The minimum age is 21+ in most legal betting states. Only Montana, New Hampshire, Rhode Island, Wyoming, and Washington DC allow 18+.

faqs.question: Which betting app has the best odds?
faqs.answer: BetMGM and Caesars typically offer the most competitive odds among betting apps. Pinnacle (where available) offers sharp odds. FanDuel and DraftKings are also competitive. Odds vary by sport and market.

faqs.question: Which sports betting app has the fastest payouts?
faqs.answer: FanDuel and BetMGM offer the fastest payouts, typically processing within 24 hours via PayPal or online banking. Caesars and DraftKings also offer fast withdrawals. Venmo and PayPal are fastest methods.

faqs.question: Do I need a promo code for betting apps?
faqs.answer: Most betting apps automatically apply welcome bonuses when you sign up through promotional links. Some apps like Caesars and Fanatics may require promo codes. Check each app's current offer.

faqs.question: What is the best NFL betting app?
faqs.answer: FanDuel is the best NFL betting app due to its same game parlay builder, extensive player props, and live betting interface. DraftKings and BetMGM also offer excellent NFL betting features.
